description: This file declares the external API for the Dslh Object Controller component in the DSL Home Model. It contains function prototypes for creating, removing, initializing, and managing object controller instances, as well as for setting and getting instruction contexts.

methods.name: DslhCreateObjController
methods.description: Creates a new object controller instance with provided container, owner, and reserved contexts.

methods.name: DslhObjcoCreate
methods.description: Creates a new object controller instance with specified contexts.

methods.name: DslhObjcoRemove
methods.description: Removes a specified object controller instance, freeing associated resources.

methods.name: DslhObjcoEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls or registers objects within the object controller.

methods.name: DslhObjcoGetInsContext
methods.description: Retrieves the instruction context for the object controller.

methods.name: DslhObjcoSetInsContext
methods.description: Sets the instruction context for the object controller.

methods.name: DslhObjcoGetParentInsContext
methods.description: Retrieves the parent instruction context for the object controller.

methods.name: DslhObjcoSetParentInsContext
methods.description: Sets the parent instruction context for the object controller.

methods.name: DslhObjcoReset
methods.description: Resets the state of the object controller.
